overview: Oakland, California. Take yourself back to Fall of 2020. The Covid-19 Pandemic is raging on... Lockdown is in place... All activities cancelled... Work is from home... School is from home... And you are 12 years old.  No School, No Sports, No Friends. Just You, Your family, and Your Computer stuck at home for the last 6 months.  Lockdown from a kids perspective.
title: The 2020 Kid
